properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD VALUES (SEQ_BD.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, DEFAULT, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, ORDER_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATED_AT, ANSWER FROM TB_BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, B.CREATED_AT, STATUS, ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME FROM TB_BOARD B JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, B.CREATED_AT, ANSWER, UPDATED_AT, STATUS, MEMBER_NO, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, MEMBER_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, FILE_NAME FROM TB_BOARD B JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TB_IMAGE USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET ANSWER = ? , UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
